name: Laser Gate (V)
Lore: 'Security corridors are guarded by a grid of laser emplacements which can be activated upon demand to seal off sensitive areas from intrusion.',
Text: 'Deploy between two non-exterior Death Star sites. Unless aboard a Lift Tube, for opponent''s character to pass opponent must first lose 1 Force. At adjacent sites: weapon destiny draws are -1, your Force generation may not be limited, and opponent''s characters are deploy +2.',
